summary: This document is an email chain from July 4-5, 2020, regarding a media inquiry from ITV News producer Kathryn Milofsky to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) about the bail hearing date in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The internal forwarding suggests the inquiry was being handled by prosecutors.

persons.name: Kathryn Milofsky
persons.context: A producer for ITV News in the UK, based in New York, who emailed the U.S. Attorney's Office to inquire about the bail hearing date in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case USA v. Maxwell, for which a bail hearing date was being sought by the media.

events.title: Media Inquiry About Maxwell Bail Hearing
events.description: Kathryn Milofsky, a producer for ITV News, emails the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to ask when the bail hearing is in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a July 2020 email chain showing media interest in the Ghislaine Maxwell case shortly after her arrest.
ITV News producer Kathryn Milofsky contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office seeking information on Maxwell's bail hearing date.
The correspondence indicates the U.S. Attorney's Office was managing media inquiries related to the high-profile case.
